summary: Cook up sausage and make a sandwich
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to "Make Me A Sandwich"

Sandwiches require several items to make. Therefore their restorative benefit is set to 20 health points.

Both the sausage and sandwich are made at any cooking pot.

First, sausage must be made with raw beef and a salt pile.
Then the sandwich must be made using:
Sausage, Tomato, Goat Cheese Wedge, Cabbage and Bread.

Only the sausage and bread for the sandwich use a single custom texture.
The other ingredients have been mapped out onto vanilla textures to cut down on file size.

AS OF 07-14-2018 NONE OF MY ASSETS ARE TO BE USED BY ANYONE FOR ANY PURPOSE.
If you don't like this change, thank the moderators for siding with plagiarizers and lying thieves on this site.
author: Mr Dave
